name: Riddle Rumble FREE- Learn And Scramble English Vocabulary
name_original: Riddle Rumble FREE- Learn And Scramble English Vocabulary
description:
This word scramble game helps you to easily learn your english vocabulary. You can choose between two game modes so the exercise makes a lot of fun.

-Endless Mode: You get 20 seconds for every 5 letters word to unscramble it. If you find the right word the next one comes up so you can play for hours.

-Blitz Mode: You can solve as many words as you can in 3 minutes. Try it often so you see your progress in learning and practice.

In both you can skip up to 3 words if you can't solve it.

Features:
-Thousands of 5 letter words
-Two game modes:
-Endless Mode -get 20 seconds per word
-Blitz Mode -you get three minutes
-See the next word preview above
-Skip up to 3 words
-Very addictive
-Suitable for all ages
-Easy to learn
-Fun sounds and music
-Universal version for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
